name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dreama Marie STOTELMYER, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dreama Marie STOTELMYER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2013, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue is:
Did the Superior Court err in holding that a person is statutorily eligible for a county intermediate punishment sentence when a mandatory minimum sentence applies under 18 Pa.C.S.A. § 7508?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
76 A.3d 536
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Dreama Marie STOTELMYER, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2013.
